```{r}
library(plyr)
```

```{r}
rikData     <- read.csv('rikData.csv')
rikData_agg <- ddply(rikData, 
                     c('objNum'),
                     summarise,
                     exp = mean(expectancy),
                     pr = table(recollection)[2]/sum(table(recollection)))

summary(rikData_agg$prsummary(rikData_agg$exp))
cor.test(rikData_agg$pr, rikData_agg$exp)
rikData_agg
```
